name: Normal Style
Mimosa
style:
conky.config = {
--==============================================================================
--  MIMOSA DARK 
--==============================================================================

  alignment = 'top_left',
  gap_x = 30,
  gap_y = 50,
  maximum_width = 330,
  minimum_height = 700,
  minimum_width = 300,
  
  use_xft = true,
  override_utf8_locale = true,
  font = 'Roboto:light:size=9',
  
  default_color = 'ffffff',
  default_outline_color = 'white',
  default_shade_color = 'white',
  color1 = '#FF4539',
  color2 = '#32d74c',
  
  background = false,
  border_width = 1,
  draw_borders = false,
  draw_graph_borders = false,
  draw_outline = false,
  draw_shades = false,
  own_window = true,
  own_window_colour = '000000',
  own_window_class = 'Conky',
  draw_blended = false,
  own_window_argb_visual = true,
  own_window_argb_value = 0,
  own_window_type = 'normal',
  own_window_transparent = false,
  own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
  stippled_borders = 0,
  
  cpu_avg_samples = 2,
  net_avg_samples = 2,
  double_buffer = true,
  out_to_console = false,
  out_to_stderr = false,
  extra_newline = false,
  update_interval = 1,
  uppercase = false,
  use_spacer = 'none',
  show_graph_scale = false,
  show_graph_range = false,
  lua_load = './styles/Mimosa/lib/disk_bar.lua ./styles/Mimosa/lib/rings_rounded.lua',
  lua_draw_hook_pre = 'system_rings',
  lua_draw_hook_post = 'draw_disk_bars',
}

conky.text = [[
${execi 600 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -g}\
${image ./styles/Mimosa/assets/bg.png -s 300x461 -p 0,135}
${offset 0}${voffset 0}${font Inter:size=45}${time %H:%M}${font}
${offset 0}${voffset 3}${font Abel:size=14}${time %A %d %B}
${offset 14}${voffset 40}${font feather:size=25}${execi 15 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -i}${goto 73}${font Bebas Neue:size=22}${execi 100 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -t}°C${font}
${offset 14}${voffset 4}${color1}${font Abel:bold:size=14}${execi 100 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -n}${font}
${offset 14}${voffset 0}${color}${font Abel:size=12}${execi 100 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -d}${font}
${offset 14}${voffset 0}${color}${font Abel:size=8}Wind speed : ${execi 100 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -ws}m/s
${offset 14}${voffset 0}${color}${font Abel:size=8}Humidity : ${execi 100 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/weather-v4.0.sh -h}%
${offset 172}${voffset -115}${font Material:size=9}${font Abel:bold:size=8}: ${execi 5 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/ssid}
${offset 172}${voffset 2}${font Abel:size=8}Dn : ${downspeed wlp9s0}${alignr 16}>>   ${totaldown wlp9s0}
${offset 172}${voffset 0}${color}${downspeedgraph wlp9s0 24,110 FF4539 FF4539}
${offset 172}${voffset -3}${color}${font Abel:size=8}Up : ${upspeed wlp9s0}${alignr 16}>>   ${totalup wlp9s0}
${offset 172}${voffset 0}${color B54036}${upspeedgraph wlp9s0 24,110 32d74c 32d74c}
${offset 27}${voffset 106}${color}${font Bebas Neue:size=18}${cpu cpu0}%${goto 104}${memperc}%${goto 170}${battery_percent BAT1}%${goto 240}${acpitemp}°C
${offset 14}${voffset 32}${color}${font Abel:bold:size=14}Storage${font}
${color}${offset 172}${voffset -20}${font Feather:size=22}
${color}${offset 172}${voffset 0}${font Abel:size=9}${execi 1 playerctl status} 
${color2}${offset 172}${voffset 0}${font Abel:bold:size=10}${execi 1 ./styles/Mimosa/scripts/playerctl-info.sh -a}${font}
${color}${offset 172}${voffset 0}${font Abel:italic:size=9}${execi 1 playerctl metadata xesam:title | cut -c 1-25}${font}
${color}${offset 172}${voffset 0}${font Abel:size=8}${execi 1 playerctl position --format "{{ duration(position) }}"}${font}
]];

name: Future Tech
style:
conky.config = {
    alignment = 'top_right',
    background = false,
    border_width = 1,
    cpu_avg_samples = 2,
    default_color = '00ffff',
    default_outline_color = 'white',
    default_shade_color = 'white',
    double_buffer = true,
    draw_borders = false,
    draw_graph_borders = true,
    draw_outline = false,
    draw_shades = false,
    use_xft = true,
    font = 'Orbitron:size=10',
    gap_x = 20,
    gap_y = 60,
    minimum_height = 5,
    minimum_width = 5,
    net_avg_samples = 2,
    no_buffers = true,
    out_to_console = false,
    out_to_stderr = false,
    extra_newline = false,
    own_window = true,
    own_window_class = 'Conky',
    own_window_type = 'normal',
    own_window_transparent = false,
    own_window_argb_visual = true,
    own_window_argb_value = 0,
    own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
    stippled_borders = 0,
    update_interval = 1.0,
    uppercase = false,
    use_spacer = 'none',
    show_graph_scale = false,
    show_graph_range = false
}

conky.text = [[
${color 00ffff}SYSTEM STATUS ${hr 2}
${color white}Uptime:${color} $uptime
${color white}Frequency:${color} $freq_g GHz
${color white}RAM Usage:${color} $mem/$memmax - $memperc% ${membar 4}
${color white}Swap Usage:${color} $swap/$swapmax - $swapperc% ${swapbar 4}
${color white}CPU Usage:${color} $cpu% ${cpubar 4}
${color white}Processes:${color} $processes  ${color white}Running:${color} $running_processes

${color 00ffff}FILE SYSTEM ${hr 2}
${color white}Root:${color} ${fs_used /}/${fs_size /} ${fs_bar 6 /}

${color 00ffff}NETWORKING ${hr 2}
${color white}Down:${color} ${downspeed eth0} ${color white}Up:${color} ${upspeed eth0}
${color white}${downspeedgraph eth0 32,150 00ffff ffffff} ${color white}${upspeedgraph eth0 32,150 00ffff ffffff}
]];

name: Retro Terminal
style:
conky.config = {
    alignment = 'bottom_left',
    background = false,
    border_width = 1,
    cpu_avg_samples = 2,
    default_color = '00ff00',
    default_outline_color = 'black',
    default_shade_color = 'black',
    double_buffer = true,
    draw_borders = false,
    draw_graph_borders = false,
    draw_outline = false,
    draw_shades = false,
    use_xft = true,
    font = 'Courier Prime:bold:size=12',
    gap_x = 20,
    gap_y = 20,
    minimum_height = 5,
    minimum_width = 5,
    net_avg_samples = 2,
    no_buffers = true,
    out_to_console = false,
    out_to_stderr = false,
    extra_newline = false,
    own_window = true,
    own_window_class = 'Conky',
    own_window_type = 'normal',
    own_window_transparent = false,
    own_window_argb_visual = true,
    own_window_argb_value = 0,
    own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
    own_window_colour = '000000',
    stippled_borders = 0,
    update_interval = 1.0,
    uppercase = true,
    use_spacer = 'none',
    show_graph_scale = false,
    show_graph_range = false
}

conky.text = [[
> SYSTEM READY
> UPTIME: $uptime
> CPU LOAD: $cpu%
> MEMORY: $memperc%
> 
> TASKS LIST:
> ${top name 1} ${top cpu 1}
> ${top name 2} ${top cpu 2}
> ${top name 3} ${top cpu 3}
> 
> NETWORK TRAFFIC
> ETH0_DOWN: ${downspeed eth0}
> ETH0_UP: ${upspeed eth0}
]];

name: Glassmorphism
style:
conky.config = {
    alignment = 'top_right',
    background = false,
    border_width = 0,
    default_color = 'white',
    default_outline_color = 'white',
    default_shade_color = 'white',
    double_buffer = true,
    draw_borders = false,
    draw_graph_borders = true,
    draw_outline = false,
    draw_shades = false,
    use_xft = true,
    font = 'Roboto:size=10',
    gap_x = 50,
    gap_y = 50,
    minimum_height = 200,
    minimum_width = 250,
    own_window = true,
    own_window_class = 'Conky',
    own_window_type = 'normal',
    own_window_transparent = false,
    own_window_argb_visual = true,
    own_window_argb_value = 100,
    own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
    own_window_colour = '000000',
    update_interval = 1.0,
}

conky.text = [[
${voffset 10}${font Roboto:light:size=50}${time %H:%M}${font}
${voffset -10}${font Roboto:light:size=20}${time %A %d %B}${font}
${voffset 20}${hr 2}
${voffset 10}${font Roboto:bold:size=12}SYSTEM${font}
CPU: ${cpu}% ${cpubar 8,100}
RAM: ${memperc}% ${membar 8,100}
DISK: ${fs_used_perc /}% ${fs_bar 8,100 /}
]];

name: Neon City
Alterf
style:
conky.config = {
--==============================================================================
--  ALTERF
--==============================================================================

  alignment = 'top_left',
  gap_x = 10,
  gap_y = 70,
  maximum_width = 360,
  minimum_height = 550,
  minimum_width = 360,
  
  use_xft = true,
  override_utf8_locale = true,
  font = 'Roboto:size=9',
  
  default_color = 'white',
  default_outline_color = 'white',
  default_shade_color = 'white',
  color1 = '212021',
  color2 = 'FF3A70',
  
  background = false,
  border_width = 1,
  draw_borders = false,
  draw_graph_borders = false,
  draw_outline = false,
  draw_shades = false,
  own_window = true,
  own_window_colour = 'FFFFFF',
  own_window_class = 'Conky',
  draw_blended = false,
  own_window_argb_visual = true,
  own_window_argb_value = 0,
  own_window_type = 'normal',
  own_window_transparent = false,
  own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
  stippled_borders = 0,
  
  cpu_avg_samples = 2,
  net_avg_samples = 2,
  double_buffer = true,
  out_to_console = false,
  out_to_stderr = false,
  extra_newline = false,
  update_interval = 1,
  uppercase = false,
  use_spacer = 'none',
  show_graph_scale = false,
  show_graph_range = false,
  lua_load = './styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/rings-v1.2.1.lua',
  lua_draw_hook_pre = 'ring_stats',
}

conky.text = [[
${execi 100 ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/weather-v2.0.sh}\
${execi 100 ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/weather-icon.sh JDWS-02}\
${image ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/res/BG.png -s 350x350 -p 0,10}\
${image ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/res/ava.png -s 56x56 -p 25,21}\
${image ~/.cache/weather-icon.png -p 116,298 -s 35x35}\
${offset 100}${voffset 30}${color1}${font Scout:size=12}Hello ${font Scout:bold:size=12}${execi 600 whoami | sed "s|\\<.|\\U&|g"}
${offset 100}${voffset 0}${color1}${font Scout:size=12}Wellcome Back!!
${offset 15}${voffset 20}${color1}${font Oswald:bold:size=22}${execi 600 ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/Greeting.sh}!!
${alignr 167}${voffset 25}${color}${font Manjari:bold:size=35}${time %d}${font}
${offset 200}${voffset -36}${color}${font Manjari:bold:size=12}${time %a}${font}
${offset 200}${voffset 0}${color}${font Manjari:bold:size=12}${time %B}${font}
${offset 35}${voffset 46}${color2}${font Scout:bold:size=14}${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq -r '.name'}${font}
${offset 35}${voffset 0}${color}${font Scout:size=11}${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq -r '.weather[0].description' | sed "s|\\<.|\\U&|g"}${font}
${offset 210}${voffset -36}${color}${font Feather:size=19}${execi 3 ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/wifi-icon}${font}
${offset 245}${voffset -30}${color}${font Scout:bold:size=9}Wi-Fi :
${offset 245}${voffset 0}${color}${font Scout:size=9}${execi 5 ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/ssid}${font}
${offset 45}${voffset 20}${color}${font Bebas Neue:size=27}${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq '.main.temp' | awk '{print int($1+0.5)}'}°F
${offset 15}${voffset 40}${color1}${font Feather:bold:size=17}${font}
${offset 15}${voffset 3}${if_running mpd}${color1}${font Scout:size=12}${exec playerctl status}
${offset 15}${voffset -7}${font Oswald:bold:size=22}${exec ./styles/AlterfPlyrctlF/scripts/playerctl.sh}${font}
${offset 15}${voffset 5}${font Scout:size=14}${exec playerctl metadata xesam:title}
]];

name: Antares
style:
conky.config = {
--==============================================================================
--  ANTARES
--==============================================================================

  alignment = 'bottom_left',
  gap_x = 50,
  gap_y = 0,
  maximum_width = 500,
  minimum_height = 350,
  minimum_width = 500,
  
  use_xft = true,
  font = 'Roboto:light:size=2',
  override_utf8_locale = true,
  
  default_color = 'white',
  default_outline_color = 'white',
  default_shade_color = 'white',
  color1 = 'FF6A00',
  
  background = false,
  border_width = 1,
  draw_borders = false,
  draw_blended = false,
  draw_graph_borders = false,
  draw_outline = false,
  draw_shades = false,
  own_window = true,
  own_window_colour = '000000',
  own_window_class = 'Conky',
  own_window_argb_visual = true,
  own_window_argb_value = 0,
  own_window_type = 'normal',
  own_window_transparent = false,
  own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
  stippled_borders = 0,
  
  cpu_avg_samples = 2,
  net_avg_samples = 2,
  double_buffer = true,
  out_to_console = false,
  out_to_stderr = false,
  extra_newline = false,
  update_interval = 1,
  uppercase = false,
  use_spacer = 'none',
  show_graph_scale = false,
  show_graph_range = false,
  lua_load = './styles/AntaresCelcius/scripts/rings-v1.2.1.lua ./styles/AntaresCelcius/scripts/time.lua',
  lua_draw_hook_pre = 'ring_stats',
  lua_draw_hook_post = 'draw_text',
}

conky.text = [[
${image ./styles/AntaresCelcius/res/bg.png -s 50x50-p 0,120}\
${image ./styles/AntaresCelcius/res/line.png -p 0,195}\
${execi 300 ./styles/AntaresCelcius/scripts/weather-v2.0.sh}\
${offset 0}${color1}${font Metropolis Black:size=60}.${color}${time %A}${font}
${offset 0}${voffset 12}${font PT Sans:size=15}${time %d %B %Y}
${alignc 225}${voffset 24}${font Weathericons73:size=30}${execi 5 ./styles/AntaresCelcius/scripts/weather-text-icon}${font}
${offset 67}${voffset -38}${color}${font PT Sans:size=9}Actual Weather in ${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq -r '.name'} is ${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq -r '.weather[0].description'} with temp ${execi 100 cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq '.main.temp' | awk '{print int($1+0.5)}'}°C.
${offset 67}${voffset 0}${color}${font PT Sans:size=9}Wind speed in your location is ${execi 100 (cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq '.wind.speed')}m/s blowing to the ${execi 5 ./styles/AntaresCelcius/scripts/wind-drctn}
${offset 67}${voffset 0}${color}${font PT Sans:size=9}And humidity is ${execi 100 (cat ~/.cache/weather.json | jq '.main.humidity')}%.
${offset 50}${voffset 49}${font PT Sans:size=9}Cpu :${goto 165}Mem :${goto 275}Home :${font}
${offset 50}${voffset 0}${font PT Sans:size=9}${cpu cpu0}%${goto 165}${memperc}%${goto 275}${fs_used_perc /home}%
${voffset 30}${offset 0}${color}${font PT Sans:bold:size=14}Time is ${lua Hour}.${lua Minute}
]];

name: Anurati Futuristic
style:
conky.config = {
    alignment = 'middle_middle',
    gap_x = 0,            -- ajusta la separación del borde derecho
    gap_y = 0,           -- ajusta la separación del borde inferior
    minimum_width = 460,
    minimum_height = 180,
    background = false,
    double_buffer = true,
    update_interval = 1,
    cpu_avg_samples = 2,
    net_avg_samples = 2,
    override_utf8_locale = true,
    use_xft = true,
    xftalpha = 1,
    own_window = true,
    own_window_type = 'normal',
    own_window_transparent = false,
    own_window_argb_visual = true,
    own_window_argb_value = 0, -- 0 = fully transparent
    own_window_hints = 'undecorated,below,sticky,skip_taskbar,skip_pager',
    draw_shades = false,
    draw_outline = false,
    draw_borders = false,
    draw_graph_borders = false,
    default_color = '#FFFFFF',
    color0 = '#EDEDED',   -- color principal (texto)
    color1 = '#C1A0FF',   -- color secundario / acento
    lua_load = '',
    
};

conky.text = [[

# Header principal
${voffset 0}${alignc}${color #FFFFFF}${font Anurati-Regular:size=72:bold}${execpi 60 date +%A | tr '[:lower:]' '[:upper:]' | sed 's/./& /g'}${font}${color}

${voffset 3}
# Fecha (pequeña) - en mayúsculas
${alignc}${font Orbitron:size=20:weight=200}${color1}${time %d %b %Y}${font}

${voffset 2}
# Hora con guiones a los lados
${alignc}${font Orbitron:size=28:weight=600}${color0}-  ${time %I:%M %p}  -${font}
]];
